segments.text: Hello.May I speak to Mark , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , just a minute.Mark , you're wanted on the phone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi ! This is Jill.How come you didn't come in today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , we had a birthday party for David last night . As a matter of fact I woke up with a terrible hangover .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's too bad.You ' ll have to be more careful nest time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , nothing special.Oh , yes , you know Bill , The guy with the moustache.His wife had a baby girl last night and he passed out cigars to everyone today , He said his wife and daughter are doing fine.The baby is their first child .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's wonderful ! We've got to celebrate !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we have to.Do you think you can make it tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I ought to be ready for some more drinks by then.Thank you for calling .
segments.speaker: S2
